channel.title: Server ip
channel.description: how do i change the server ip to my adress..its stuck on 127.0.0.1 this is all i need to know for my server to be up and running thanks for all the people that has helped me through all my problems i now ive had alot

item.title: Server ip
item.dc:creator: @Masterthom Masterthom
item.description:
@Masterthom wrote:

Right is really easy.

  1. Search for a file called loader.java or client.java
  2. Press ctrl+f and enter 127.0.0.1
  3. Replace that with ur own Ip
  4. Go to your compile.bat or build.bat
    And ur done…

Read full topic
